A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cinematography is competent. Other than that\, plot (very limited\, boring)\, script (lines)\, characters  and character development are horrible. Humor is not funny. Lifelong Star Wars fan\, severely disgusted by the \"product\" Disney made. FYI\, my girlfriend and my college age daughter also disliked the movie just as much as me. I guess we all hate women. Strange\, because the Battlestar Galactica remake is one of my most beloved television shows ever.
